data.title: The Kingdom of Lesotho has formally joined IPBES as its 145th Member
data.meta_description: Dear IPBES members, observers and other interested stakeholders,I am very pleased to announce that the Government of the Kingdom of Lesotho has formally joined IPBES as its 145th Member!!The secretariat will post on the IPBES website the information regarding the designated National Focal Point for IPBES as soon as it has been received. I know that you will join me in warmly welcoming Lesotho to the growing IPBES family.
data.text:
Dear IPBES members, observers and other interested stakeholders,

I am very pleased to announce that the Government of the Kingdom of Lesotho has formally joined IPBES as its 145th Member!!

The secretariat will post on the IPBES website the information regarding the designated National Focal Point for IPBES as soon as it has been received.

I know that you will join me in warmly welcoming Lesotho to the growing IPBES family.
